plot outline: Santhosh is an NRI living in urban England. On a visit to India, he meets a simple village belle named Siri and instantly falls for her. Siri was raised by her elder brother. The brother is a hardworking farmer and has always been very protective of his sister. He will only gives his blessing for Siri's marriage if Santhosh can prove himself to be a capable farmer...
title: Neenello Naanalle
plot: Before he can marry his sweetheart, a city-boy from England is challenged to prove his work ethic on a farm in rural India.

Santhosh is an NRI living in urban England. On a visit to India, he meets a simple village belle named Siri and instantly falls for her. Siri was raised by her elder brother. The brother is a hardworking farmer and has always been very protective of his sister. He will only gives his blessing for Siri's marriage if Santhosh can prove himself to be a capable farmer...::L. Hamre
